document.forum_title: Food - Siskiyou Daily News, Yreka, CA
document.discussion_title: Great addition to any meal: Roasted cabbage wedges
document.topic_text: Great addition to any meal: Roasted cabbage wedges Stunning and simple. Sarah’s roasted cabbage wedges are flavored with fennel seeds, making this wedge a satisfying side dish to accompany any meal. Comment By Inform Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 10:45 AM By Inform Posted Apr. 25, 2016 at 10:45 AM Stunning and simple. Sarah’s roasted cabbage wedges are flavored with fennel seeds, making this wedge a satisfying side dish to accompany any meal. Just a few ingredients create a flavorful dish. Watch below on how to make this side dish: By Inform By Inform
